category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PLMXML_pre_expand_bop
preference.preference_description: Determines if the pre-expand functionality is run prior to a PLMXML expand operation. If the value of the PLMXML_pre_expand_max_line_limit preference is 0 and this preference value is true, the pre-expansion will happen (the PLMXML_pre_expand_batch_size preference will be set to its maximum value and the value of the PLMXML_pre_expand_max_line_limit preference will be disregarded).
